verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus, still lead on till our rest be won. And, although the way be cheerless, we will follow, calm and fearless; guide us by Your hand to our Fatherland.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: When we seek relief from a long-felt grief-- when oppressed by new temptations, Lord, increase and perfect patience. Show us that bright shore where we weep no more.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Jesus, still lead on till our rest be won; Heav'nly Leader, still direct us, still support, console, protect us, till we safely stand in our Fatherland.
